name: PolyPort
description: PolyPort is the PumpFun of prediction markets - a fully permissionless, decentralized platform on Solana that lets anyone create a prediction market with zero upfront capital. Todayâ€™s major prediction markets are centralized and curated, limiting creativity, speed, and the true potential of the category. PolyPort flips this model by letting anyone launch a market, where both creators and liquidity providers earn fees from trading activity, creating a powerful self-incentivizing ecosystem. Liquidity has always been the biggest challenge in prediction markets, and PolyPort solves it with a breakthrough: any market can go live with just 3 SOL, and liquidity scales naturally as trading grows. Powered by a CPMM engine, the same model used by Uniswap but optimized for prediction markets, PolyPort offers instant on-chain odds, no order books, and no waiting. PolyPort's mission is simple: democratize prediction markets so anyone can create, trade, and provide liquidity.
